title: The Macabre Reader
description: Most of these are classics, from the 1930s and even earlier. 222 pages of ghouls and ghosties and Things that go Bump in the Night.Contents:The crawling horror / Thorp McClusky --The opener of the way / Robert Bloch --In Amundsen's tent / John Martin Leahy --The thing on the doorstep / H. P. Lovecraft --The hollow man / Thomas Burke --It will grow on you / Donald Wandrei --The hunters from beyond / Clark Ashton Smith --The curse of Yig / Zealia Brown Bishop --The cairn of the headland / Robert E. Howard --The trap / Henry S. Whitehead.
author: Donald A. Wollheim
